channel.title: What is "bump"
channel.description: in the rules of this site it says 3.1. We don't "bump" or double post. what is bump? :confused:

item.title: What is "bump"
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

“lol”

Read full topic

item.title: What is "bump"
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:3, topic:12137”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=18000.msg204578#msg204578 date=1157111122]
that is when you make a post, and then keep double posting in it to keep it at the top, that is called a bump (stands for bring up my post)
[/quote] oh ok soory but i think i have bumped several times but not intentionally…i just realised that it comes to the top lol[/quote]

it always comes to the top, but a post that is useful is not a bump, only posts like this are considered bumps:

“bump”
“.”

basically posting with no other objective than bringing it to the top

Read full topic
